languages.text: {n}Ахиллеас разводит руками.{/n} "Разумеется, вы в своем праве, Вольный Торговец. Однако помните, что в этом случае многоуровневая бюрократическая система Даргонуса — да и всего протектората — разойдется по швам. И это не считая вероятных попыток мести от родственников и союзников".

{n}Achilleas shrugs.{/n} "You are, naturally, well within your right, Rogue Trader. But remember that this will cause the multilayered bureaucratic system of Dargonus — of your entire protectorate, in fact — to come apart at the seams. And that's not even considering the likelihood of attempted reprisals from their families and allies."
languages.original_text: {n}Ахиллеас разводит руками.{/n} "Разумеется, вы в своем праве, Вольный Торговец. Однако помните, что в этом случае многоуровневая бюрократическая система Даргонуса — да и всего протектората — разойдется по швам. И это не считая вероятных попыток мести от родственников и союзников".

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas shrugs.{/n} "You are, naturally, well within your right, Rogue Trader. But remember that this will cause the multilayered bureaucratic system of Dargonus — of your entire trade empire, come to think of it — to come apart at the seams. And that's not even considering the likelihood of attempted vendettas from their families and allies."

And that's not even considering the likelihood of attempted vendettas from their families and allies."

{n}Achilleas shrugs.{/n} "You are, naturally, well within your right, Rogue Trader. But remember that this will cause the multilayered bureaucratic system of Dargonus — of your entire protectorate, in fact — to come apart at the seams. languages.text: {n}阿吉里亚斯耸了耸肩。{/n}“您自然有权力这么做，行商浪人。但请记住，这么做会导致达戈努斯的官僚系统，以及您的全部属地分崩离析。不仅如此，您还需要考虑他们的家人与盟友寻求报复的可能性。”
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas shrugs.{/n} "You are, naturally, well within your right, Rogue Trader. But remember that this will cause the multilayered bureaucratic system of Dargonus — of your entire protectorate, in fact — to come apart at the seams. And that's not even considering the likelihood of attempted reprisals from their families and allies."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿吉里亚斯耸了耸肩。{/n}“您自然有权力这么做，行商浪人。但请记住，这么做会导致达戈努斯的官僚系统，以及您的全部属地分崩离析。不仅如此，您还需要考虑他们的家人与盟友寻求报复的可能性。”

languages.text: {n}Achilleas se encoge de hombros.{/n} «Como Comerciante Independiente, está plenamente en su derecho. Sin embargo, recuerde que esto causará que las numerosas capas que forman el delicado sistema burocrático de Dargonus y de todo su protectorado se desmorone. Y luego quedarían los intentos de represalia por parte de familiares y aliados».
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas shrugs.{/n} "You are, naturally, well within your right, Rogue Trader. But remember that this will cause the multilayered bureaucratic system of Dargonus — of your entire protectorate, in fact — to come apart at the seams. And that's not even considering the likelihood of attempted reprisals from their families and allies."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas se encoge de hombros.{/n} «Como Comerciante Independiente, está plenamente en su derecho. Sin embargo, recuerde que esto causará que las numerosas capas que forman el delicado sistema burocrático de Dargonus y de todo su protectorado se desmorone. Y luego quedarían los intentos de represalia por parte de familiares y aliados».

languages.text: {n}アキレアスは肩をすくめる。{/n}「当然、陛下の権限でできるでしょう、自由開拓者。ですがそのようなお考えは、ダルゴナスに重層的な官吏システムを生み出します。それどころか、すべての保護領に波及し、破綻をもたらすでしょう。それに、そのお考えには、貴族家とその仲間から報復を受ける可能性さえ含まれていませんね」
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas shrugs.{/n} "You are, naturally, well within your right, Rogue Trader. But remember that this will cause the multilayered bureaucratic system of Dargonus — of your entire protectorate, in fact — to come apart at the seams. And that's not even considering the likelihood of attempted reprisals from their families and allies."

traits.locale_text: {n}アキレアスは肩をすくめる。{/n}「当然、陛下の権限でできるでしょう、自由開拓者。ですがそのようなお考えは、ダルゴナスに重層的な官吏システムを生み出します。それどころか、すべての保護領に波及し、破綻をもたらすでしょう。それに、そのお考えには、貴族家とその仲間から報復を受ける可能性さえ含まれていませんね」

languages.text: {n}Achilleas zuckt mit den Schultern.{/n} "Das wäre natürlich Euer Recht, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Bedenkt jedoch, dass dadurch das vielschichtige Bürokratiesystem von Dargonus – sogar von Eurem gesamten Protektorat – aus den Fugen geraten würde. Und dabei ist die Wahrscheinlichkeit versuchter Vergeltungsmaßnahmen ihrer Familien und Verbündeten noch nicht einmal berücksichtigt."
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas shrugs.{/n} "You are, naturally, well within your right, Rogue Trader. But remember that this will cause the multilayered bureaucratic system of Dargonus — of your entire protectorate, in fact — to come apart at the seams. And that's not even considering the likelihood of attempted reprisals from their families and allies."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas zuckt mit den Schultern.{/n} "Das wäre natürlich Euer Recht, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Bedenkt jedoch, dass dadurch das vielschichtige Bürokratiesystem von Dargonus – sogar von Eurem gesamten Protektorat – aus den Fugen geraten würde. Und dabei ist die Wahrscheinlichkeit versuchter Vergeltungsmaßnahmen ihrer Familien und Verbündeten noch nicht einmal berücksichtigt."

languages.text: {n}Achilleas hausse les épaules.{/n} « Vous seriez parfaitement dans votre droit, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, mais gardez à l'esprit que cela provoquerait l'effondrement immédiat du système bureaucratique de Dargonus... et de tout votre protectorat. Sans même parler des risques de représailles venant aussi bien des membres des famille décimées que de leurs alliés. »
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas shrugs.{/n} "You are, naturally, well within your right, Rogue Trader. But remember that this will cause the multilayered bureaucratic system of Dargonus — of your entire protectorate, in fact — to come apart at the seams. And that's not even considering the likelihood of attempted reprisals from their families and allies."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas hausse les épaules.{/n} « Vous seriez parfaitement dans votre droit, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, mais gardez à l'esprit que cela provoquerait l'effondrement immédiat du système bureaucratique de Dargonus... et de tout votre protectorat. Sans même parler des risques de représailles venant aussi bien des membres des famille décimées que de leurs alliés. »

languages.text: {n}Achilleas omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Bu elbette sahip olduğunuz bir haktır Hür Tacir ancak bunun çok katmanlı Dargonus bürokratik sisteminin, hatta tüm protektoranın paramparça olmasına neden olacağını unutmayın. Ailelerin ve müttefiklerinin muhtemel misilleme girişimlerini hesaba katmıyorum bile."
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas shrugs.{/n} "You are, naturally, well within your right, Rogue Trader. But remember that this will cause the multilayered bureaucratic system of Dargonus — of your entire protectorate, in fact — to come apart at the seams. And that's not even considering the likelihood of attempted reprisals from their families and allies."
